entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
